name: Eidolon [2021 Demo]
description:
The lands are dangerous and filled with roaming monsters. They like to shout nonsense and attack on sight. One of them is friendly, and wants to build a city. This is now your problem.
Gather monster friends and transform into them as well in this turn-based RPG mons style game!

Content warning: Contains fantasy violence, occasional language, sexual humor and drug references
